snippet.title: Once Upon A Puppet | Release Date Trailer - Future Games Show 2025
snippet.description:
Once Upon A Puppet will release on April 23 on PC and Consoles!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1904880/Once_Upon_A_Puppet/
https://store.playstation.com/concept/10012783
https://www.xbox.com/games/store/once-upon-a-puppet/9MV8T4C45MXL

Once Upon a Puppet combines classic platforming with unique puppet-inspired gameplay. Set in a vibrant theatrical world, you'll control Nieve, a Stagehand exiled to the Understage, and Drev, a Puppet bound to her by magical strings. Together, they embark on a quest to return to the Frontstage, unraveling forgotten stories and uncovering shadowy secrets along the way.

https://www.flatterthanearth.com/
https://www.instagram.com/onceuponapuppetgame/
https://www.facebook.com/onceuponapuppetgame
https://x.com/onceuponapuppet

http://www.twitter.com/daedalic 
http://www.facebook.com/daedalic 
https://www.instagram.com/daedalicentertainment
http://www.daedalic.com
